Class ApplicantDataManager

java.lang.Object
datamanager.ApplicantDataManager
public class ApplicantDataManager extends Object
ApplicantDataManager handles the interaction between the application and the ApplicantList.txt file. It is responsible for reading and writing applicant data to the text file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicantDataManager()
    Default constructor that uses the file path from FilePathConfig.
    ApplicantDataManager(String filePath)
    Constructor for ApplicantDataManager with a specified file path.

    • readAllApplicants

      public List<Applicant> readAllApplicants()
      Reads all applicants from the applicant data file.
      Returns:
      A list of Applicant objects

    • findApplicantByNRIC

      public Applicant findApplicantByNRIC(String nric)
      Finds an applicant by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for
      Returns:
      The applicant if found, null otherwise

    • updateApplicant

      public boolean updateApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Updates an existing applicant in the applicant data file.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to update
      Returns:
      true if the applicant was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • writeApplicants

      public boolean writeApplicants(List<Applicant> applicants)
      Writes the list of applicants to the applicant data file.
      Parameters:
      applicants - The list of applicants to write
      Returns:
      true if the applicants were written successfully, false otherwise
